message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it! I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay at the moment. How about $100?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can sell it to you for $110.
